title: QuickLink
description: QuickLink is a tool for creating and sharing short, secure file transfer links.
introduction: In today's digital age, secure and efficient file sharing is crucial. QuickLink aims to provide a seamless solution for users to share files securely using short, easy-to-use links.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The need for secure file sharing became apparent as existing solutions were either insecure or cumbersome. QuickLink was envisioned to bridge this gap by offering a user-friendly platform with robust security features.

sections.title: Initial Development
sections.body: We chose React for the frontend to ensure a responsive and intuitive user interface. Node.js was selected for the backend to handle real-time file transfers efficiently. The initial setup focused on core functionality and user experience.

sections.title: Security Challenges
sections.body: Implementing encryption and access controls was crucial. We utilized AES-256 encryption for data security and implemented token-based authentication to ensure only authorized access.

sections.title: Testing and Feedback
sections.body: User testing revealed the need for a more streamlined interface. Feedback led to iterative improvements, enhancing usability and performance.

sections.title: Launch and Future Plans
sections.body: QuickLink was successfully launched, offering a scalable solution for secure file sharing. Future plans include adding advanced analytics and exploring blockchain for enhanced security.
